Journal Articles

A curated collection of peer-reviewed journal articles representing my ongoing contributions to research, scholarship, and evidence-based inquiry. These publications reflect work across environmental science, climate research, and interdisciplinary studies aimed at advancing knowledge and informing practice.

Impact of Climate Variability on Agricultural Productivity and Food Securityin Banke, Nepal: Insights from 1990-2020

April 2025

Nepal’s climate diversity presents complex challenges for its agrarian communities, particularly in regions like Banke where agriculture is highly sensitive to climatic shifts. This study analyzed the period 1990–2020 in Janaki Rural Municipality and found a minor but steady rise in temperature (0.0946°C/year), a significant increase in sunshine hours (15.15 hours/year), and a modest rise in annual rainfall (1.94 mm/year). Statistical analysis showed that sunshine...

Spatial and Temporal Variations of Surface Air Temperature (1962–2022) across Physiographic Regions in the Koshi Basin, Nepal

December 2024

This study analyzed the seasonal and annual trends of maximum temperature (Tmax), minimum temperature (Tmin), and mean temperature (Tavg) across the physiographic regions (Himalaya, High Mountain, Middle Mountain, Siwalik, and Terai) of the Koshi Basin using observed data from 23 stations between 1962 and 2022...
